Berline.rs

A Berlin-local Rust community

Projects

  • tbd.rs - tbd.rs is an attempt to write a different style of database library for the Rust ecosystem. More drawing inspiration from Ecto or Rom, it appreciates the complexity of databases. It aims to make the easy cases easy and the hard ones supported.
